context_bundle.summary: Parallel task execution pattern for running independent tasks concurrently with fan-out/fan-in aggregation to maximize throughput

onboarding.quick_start: Fan-out: Launch all independent tasks simultaneously. Fan-in: Wait for all to complete, aggregate results. Use for tasks without dependencies.
common_patterns: Identify parallelizable tasks: Check if all dependencies are complete
Fan-out: Send commands to multiple agents simultaneously
Polling: Check each agent's outbox for completion
Fan-in: Aggregate results when all tasks complete
Timeout: Abort if any task exceeds deadline
known_errors: Resource contention with too many parallel tasks
Slowest task determines total completion time
Error in one task may require aborting all parallel tasks
